channel.title: Changing the emote list
channel.description:
hi all i got a question
i saw on some servers that they got some stuff changed in the emote list like:
Yes = Thieving and No = PK
and i wanted to know how to do that :)

item.title: Changing the emote list
item.dc:creator: @lollie lollie
item.description:
@lollie wrote:

so if i have this :

case 166: // dance emote if(emotes == 0) { emotes = 1; pEmote = 0x362; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

i must delete :

if(emotes == 0) { emotes = 1; pEmote = 0x362; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
so i only have case 166: // dance emote break;

and then add the stuff i want?

item.title: Changing the emote list
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

ow i think he gave you ronge case XD
you can search for this cases :

case 166: // dance emote startAnimation(0x362); break; case 52050: // panic emote startAnimation(0x839); break; case 52051: // jig emote startAnimation(0x83A); break; case 52052: // spin emote startAnimation(0x83B); break; case 52053: // headbang emote startAnimation(0x83C); break; case 52054: //joy jump emote startAnimation(0x83D); break; case 52055: // rasp' berry emote startAnimation(0x83E); break; case 52056: // yawn emote startAnimation(0x83F); break; case 52057: // salute emote startAnimation(0x840); break; case 52058: // shrug emote startAnimation(0x841); break; case 43092: // blow kiss emote startAnimation(0x558); break; case 2155: // glass box emote startAnimation(0x46B); break; case 25103: // climb rope emote startAnimation(0x46A); break; case 25106: // lean emote startAnimation(0x469); break; case 2154: // glass wall emote startAnimation(0x468); break; case 52071: // goblin bow emote startAnimation(0x84F); break; case 52072: // goblin dance emote startAnimation(0x850); break;

Read full topic

item.description:

lol did

this :

case 164: // regular walk
teleportToX = 3700;
teleportToY = 3000;

now every time i try to walk i get teleported thats not wat i wanted XD

wat i wanted to get was in emote list at those emotion buttons a teleport to somewere or commands like ::bank

item.title: Changing the emote list
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

open client.java and (Ctrl + f ) for

case 164:

you shouls see this…

case 164: // regular walk closeInterface(); resetAnimation();

to add a tele take out

closeInterface(); resetAnimation();

and add this

teleportToX = X cords;
teleportToY = Y cords;

and just add the cords were it says X cords and y cords so it will look like ,somin this,

teleportToX = 3700;
teleportToY = 3000;

hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the emote list
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

this are ALL emote codes if you add this you will see everything will be empty add a tekst bewteen the " "

[code]//EMOTES START
sendFrame126(“Teleport Buttons”,174); //Emotes:
sendFrame126("@whi@",180); //emote 1
sendFrame126("@whi@",181); //emote 2
sendFrame126("@whi@",178); //emote 3
sendFrame126("@whi@",175); //emote 4
sendFrame126("@whi@",177); //emote 5
sendFrame126("@whi@",182); //emote 6
sendFrame126("@whi@",185); //emote 7
sendFrame126("@whi@",186); //emote 8
sendFrame126("@whi@",173); //emote 9
sendFrame126("@whi@",179); //emote 10
sendFrame126("@whi@",187); //emote 11
sendFrame126("@whi@",176); //emote 12
sendFrame126("@whi@",13371); //emote 13
sendFrame126("@whi@",13372); //emote 14
sendFrame126("@whi@",13373); //emote 15
sendFrame126("@whi@",13374); //emote 16 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",13375); //emote 16 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",13376); //emote 17 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",13377); //emote 17 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",13378); //emote 18 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",13379); //emote 18 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",13380); //emote 19
sendFrame126("@whi@",13381); //emote 20
sendFrame126("@whi@",13382); //emote 21
sendFrame126("@whi@",11102); //emote 22 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",11103); //emote 22 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",6533); //emote 23 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",6532); //emote 23 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",6540); //emote 24 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",6541); //emote 24 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",11101); //emote 25
sendFrame126("@whi@",6519); //emote 26 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",6522); //emote 26 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",13386); //emote 27 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",13388); //emote 27 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",13387); //emote 28 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",15170); //emote 28 under
sendFrame126("@whi@",15175); //emote 29
sendFrame126("@whi@",18466); //emote 30
sendFrame126("@whi@",18467); //emote 30
sendFrame126("@whi@",18468); //emote 31 above
sendFrame126("@whi@",18469); //emote 31 under
//EMOTES END

//Everything Above is coded by Supra s[/code]
